sentences: Mul oli see temaga enne kokku lepitud.
context: The word 'töötasid' is the past tense (imperfect) plural form of the Estonian verb 'töötama', which means 'to work'. It specifically refers to completed actions in the past. The first-person singular would be 'töötasin', and it changes based on subject: töötasin (I worked), töötasid (you worked/he/she/it worked), töötasime (we worked), töötasite (y'all worked), töötasid (they worked).
